Index.description: Join Zeetaa today! Connect with like-minded individuals, discover new friendships, and create unforgettable experiences together!

Login.description: Sign in to your Zeetaa account today!

Register.firstNameError: First name must be more than 2 letters
Register.firstNameMaxError: First name must be less than 30 letters
Register.lastNameError: Last name must be more than 2 letters
Register.lastNameMaxError: Last name must be less than 30 letters
Register.usernameError: Username must be more than 4 letters
Register.usernameMaxError: Username must be less than 15 letters
Register.passwordError: Password must be more than 6 letters
Register.passwordMaxError: Password must be less than 30 letters

RegistrationAction.usernameExistError: Username already exists, please try another one.
RegistrationAction.emailExistError: Email already exists, please try another one.

HomePage.noSessionError: You must be logged in to view this page.
HomePage.longMessageError: Post cannot be longer than 1000 characters.
HomePage.noFeedData: No feeds to show, be the first to post!

ProfilePage.noSessionButton: Sign In to interact with this user
ProfilePage.friendRequestAlreadySentError: Friend request already sent, please wait for the user to accept your request.
ProfilePage.noFeedData: hasen't posted anything yet, either they are new or they have their posts set to private.

NotificationPage.noSessionError: You must be logged in to view this page.

FriendsPage.noSessionError: You must be logged in to view this page.
FriendsPage.noFriendsYet: No friends yet, Why not send a friend request to someone?

SearchUserPage.noUserFoundError: No user found with that username, please try another one.

SettingsPage.bioDescription: Tell us about yourself for people to know you better!
SettingsPage.signOutDescription: You will be signed out of your account. You can sign back in anytime.
SettingsPage.deleteAccountDescription: Deleting your account will permanently remove all of your data from Zeetaa. This action cannot be undone.
SettingsPage.confirmAccountDeletion: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone. Please enter your password to confirm.
SettingsPage.successMessage: Account deleted successfully!, you will be signed out in 5 seconds.
SettingsPage.sameBioError: Bio is the same as before, No change were made.

PersonalDetailsPage.usernameDescription: Username is used to identify you on Zeetaa, it can be changed anytime but must be unique.
PersonalDetailsPage.emailDescription: Email is used as a way to contact you, it can be changed anytime but must be unique. Changing your email will sign you out and you will have to sign in again.
PersonalDetailsPage.nameDescription: Name is private and is used to identify you on Zeetaa.
PersonalDetailsPage.passwordDescription: Password is used to protect your account, it can be changed anytime.
PersonalDetailsPage.sameUsernameError: Username is the same as before, No change were made.
PersonalDetailsPage.usernameExistsError: Username already exists, please try another one.
PersonalDetailsPage.sameEmailError: Email is the same as before, No change were made.
PersonalDetailsPage.emailExistsError: Email already exists, please try another one.
PersonalDetailsPage.emailChangedSuccess: Email changed successfully!, sign-outing in 5 seconds...
PersonalDetailsPage.sameNameError: Name is the same as before, No change were made.
PersonalDetailsPage.samePasswordError: Password is the same as before, No change were made.
